name: breast soft tissue lesion
description: A breast soft tissue lesion refers to any abnormal growth or mass within the soft tissue of the breast, which may include various entities such as cysts, fibromas, or malignant tumors, typically identified through imaging modalities like mammography or ultrasound.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Presence or absence of breast soft tissue lesion

values.name: absent
values.description: Breast soft tissue lesion is absent

values.name: present
values.description: Breast soft tissue lesion is present

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: Presence of breast soft tissue lesion cannot be determined

values.name: unknown
values.description: Presence of breast soft tissue lesion is unknown

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Specifies the location of the breast soft tissue lesion.

values.name: right breast
values.description: Lesion located in the right breast.

values.name: left breast
values.description: Lesion located in the left breast.
